usefulItems: airtight container, large bowl, paper cupcake cases, 12 hole muffin tin, refrigerator
title: Chocolate Easter Nests

ingredients.content: 140 g shredded wheat cereal, (approx. 6 large shredded wheat)
250 g milk chocolate, small pieces or callets

preparations.content: Line a 12 hole muffin tin with paper cupcake cases.
Place shredded wheat in mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 6<b>. Transfer to a large bowl and set aside.
Place chocolate in mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add butter and syrup then melt <b>4 min/50°C/speed <b>.
Add melted chocolate mixture to bowl with shredded wheat and stir with spatula until combined. Divide mixture between paper cases.
Use a teaspoon to create a well in the middle of each nest, then add 2-3 mini chocolate eggs to each. Place in fridge for 30 minutes. Serve immediately or store in an airtight container until needed.

hintsAndTricks: Children can assist with this recipe, weighing ingredients in and setting the controls. Never leave them unattended with Thermomix, while it is running or between steps.
Children can also help with nest making and decorating.
